display_priority.description: Field to specify the display sequence order of images associated to the item per priority.

image_addr.description: Path where the image file is stored.

image_desc.description: This field contains the description associated with the image of the item.

image_type.description: This field contains the type of the image of the item. Valid values are defined as member of IITD code type.

primary_ind.description: Field indicating whether the record is a primary image or not.

number4.description: This type can hold a number of digits count 4.

varchar21.description: This type can hold a string of max length of 1 character.

varchar2120.description: This type can hold a string of max length of 120 characters.

varchar225.description: This type can hold a string of max length of 25 characters.

varchar2255.description: This type can hold a string of max length of 255 characters.

varchar240.description: This type can hold a string of max length of 40 characters.

varchar26.description: This type can hold a string of max length of 6 characters.
